str.name: app.store.description
str.val: Download Youtube videos directly into Adobe with the click of a button.

str.name: app.store.ui.description
str.val: Download Youtube videos directly into Adobe with the click of a button.

str.name: form.warning.speed
str.val: Download speed for this selection is much slower.

str.name: error.generic
str.val: An error occurred, that's all we know

str.name: error.system.space
str.val: There wasn't enough hard drive space to continue

str.name: error.system.permission
str.val: Couldn't write to the target folder

str.name: error.network.toomany
str.val: Too many requests, try again later

str.name: error.network.forbidden
str.val: You don't have permission to do that

str.name: error.network.failed
str.val: The internet seems to be down, try again later

str.name: error.twitch.generic
str.val: Twitch is having problems, try again later
